about_the_game:
The Original Soundtrack for Total War: PHARAOH transports you to the sandy deserts, royal temples and lush, abundant lands of ancient Egypt during the earth-shattering time of the Bronze Age Collapse.

Experience this iconic age through a collection of 23 stunning and atmospheric tracks, where the use of rich instrumentation and evocative soundscapes bring the epic conflicts of the time to life.
detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack for Total War: PHARAOH transports you to the sandy deserts, royal temples and lush, abundant lands of ancient Egypt during the earth-shattering time of the Bronze Age Collapse.

Experience this iconic age through a collection of 23 stunning and atmospheric tracks, where the use of rich instrumentation and evocative soundscapes bring the epic conflicts of the time to life.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 516 MB available space
